response.original_title: 望海風斗「ザ・ラストデイ」
response.overview: This is the last performance at Tokyo Takarazuka Theater, also the Last Stage of Takarazuka Revue Snow Troupe Top Star Futo Nozomi who will withdraw from Takarazuka Revue.  Don’t miss the stage that full of charm of Top Star Futo Nozomi who led the snow Troupe with the overwhelming singing power and performance power that moved the audience.  　　This is also the last stage of Top Musume-yaku, Kiho Maaya. The combination of Top Star that shines on the stage with unprecedented singing voice and superb acting skills, is integrated in this Last Day. We will live broadcast not only the performance, but also the SAYONARA Show and the speech of leaving members.  　　Please enjoy the Last Day of Snow Troupe Top Star, Futo Nozomi, in the nearby movie theater.
response.title: Futo Nozomi LAST DAY
